theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on accumulation of senescent cells and their SASP driving aging and tissue dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes senescent cell buildup and clearance as key to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes accelerated senescence and SASP-driven inflammation contributing to tissue damage.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights SASP and cell identity shifts as drivers of aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links cellular senescence and SASP to neurodegenerative disease and brain aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent cell accumulation and senolysis as therapeutic intervention.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes macrophage clearance of senescent cells and SASP impact on aging and cancer.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Connects unfolded protein response with senescence phenotype and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Oxidative Stress and Membrane Signaling Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on caveolae and caveolin-1 mediating oxidative stress and mitochondrial dysfunction in senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Oxidative Stress and Membrane Signaling Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Premature senescence in diabetes linked to metabolic stress and accelerated tissue aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Oxidative Stress and Membrane Signaling Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes energy decline and mitochondrial dysfunction driving brain aging and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Oxidative Stress and Membrane Signaling Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Endothelial DNA damage and senescence impair neurovascular function, linked to oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Oxidative Stress and Membrane Signaling Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Mitotic catastrophe induces polyploidy and senescence via DNA/spindle damage and stress responses.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Oxidative Stress and Membrane Signaling Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Systemic circulating factors modulate senescence, likely affecting oxidative stress and signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Oxidative Stress and Membrane Signaling Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Schizophrenia as segmental progeria involves cellular senescence and apoptosis linked to oxidative and epigenetic stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell Cycle Regulation and Proliferation Arrest Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cell cycle transition probabilities and altered proliferation dynamics in senescent cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell Cycle Regulation and Proliferation Arrest Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: B-MYB transcription factor regulates cell cycle progression and its loss induces senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell Cycle Regulation and Proliferation Arrest Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: p53-p21 pathway and post-translational p21 stabilization enforce cell cycle arrest in senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell Cycle Regulation and Proliferation Arrest Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: DNA synthesis inhibitor protein accumulates to irreversibly block cell cycle in senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell Cycle Regulation and Proliferation Arrest Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Replicative senescence and markers of cell cycle arrest define senescent cell accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell Cycle Regulation and Proliferation Arrest Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Yeast replicative senescence models limited division capacity and aging linked to cell cycle arrest.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nuclear Genetic and Epigenetic Programming Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Programmed cellular lifespan controlled by nuclear chromatin and transcriptional regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Telomere shortening triggers senescence and inflammation affecting placental aging and birth outcomes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Microglial telomere damage causes premature senescence contributing to Alzheimer's disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Recognition and Clearance of Senescent Cells Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Senescent cell antigen on membranes triggers immune clearance, linking molecular aging to systemic removal.
